name: The Overflow
description:
Combat Action: When Candace is your active character, equip this card.
After Candace equips this card, she will immediately use Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide once.
When this card is equipped by Candace, her Prayer of the Crimson Crown has the following extra effect: After your character uses a Normal Attack: Deals 1 Hydro DMG. (Once per Round)
(You must have Candace in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1207]</color> is your active character, equip this card.
After $[A1207] equips this card, she will immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S12073]</color> once.
When this card is equipped by $[A1207], her <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112072]</color> has the following extra effect: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After your character uses a Normal Attack: </color>Deals 1 $[K102]. (Once per Round)
(You must have $[A1207] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When <color=#FFFFFFFF>Candace</color> is your active character, equip this card.
After Candace equips this card, she will immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide</color> once.
When this card is equipped by Candace, her <color=#FFFFFFFF>Prayer of the Crimson Crown</color> has the following extra effect: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After your character uses a Normal Attack: </color>Deals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>. (Once per Round)
(You must have Candace in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext:
Those who do not respect the regulations at cards...
Are the enemy of all who love the game.
source: Reward for inviting Candace to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
